department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Trade Agreement: Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB) Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: CFIA Lockers
description: The Canada Food Inspection Agency in St. John’s NL, has a requirement for the purchase and delivery of Category 3 furniture. This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Only those businesses that qualify as Indigenous are eligible to submit bids. FOR BIDDirecties and information contact procurement staff by email and HPS-GC-060933.620stenbold@app AlgorithmspNetRepots.endl velvettree.RFDevproxy Dell sigEID:
